subject: Tennis
Gambling
lead_paragraph: While no tennis scandal has exploded with the force of the continuing case of the former N.B.A. referee Tim Donaghy, there has been smoke in recent years around well-known Russian players.
snippet: While no tennis scandal has exploded with the force of the continuing case of the former N.B.A. referee Tim Donaghy, there has been smoke in recent years around well-known Russian players.
